div.style: align-items: center; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(226, 226, 226), rgb(201, 214, 255)); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: flex; font-family: "Segoe WPC", "Segoe UI", sans-serif; font-size: 13px; inline-size: 671.938px; justify-content: center; padding-block: 30px; padding: 30px; padding-inline: 30px; scrollbar-color: rgba(111, 195, 223, 0.6) rgb(0, 0, 0); unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 671.938px; -webkit-locale: "en";

animation-duration: 0.3s; animation-name: bounceF; animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1); border-radius: 5px; border-end-end-radius: 5px; border-end-start-radius: 5px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 20px 60px 0px; display: flex; min-inline-size: 100px; min-width: 100px; overflow: hidden; transition-duration: 0.2s; transition-property: opacity; unicode-bidi: isolate;

align-items: center; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); block-size: 35px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-top-right-radius: 5px; cursor: default; display: flex; height: 35px; padding-block: 3px; padding: 3px 18px; padding-inline: 18px; unicode-bidi: isolate;

background-color: rgb(255, 95, 85); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(255, 189, 45); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(37, 201, 63); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: flex; min-block-size: 150px; min-height: 150px; min-inline-size: 250px; min-width: 250px; padding-block: 10px; padding: 10px 18px; padding-inline: 18px; unicode-bidi: isolate;
display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-inline-end: 15px; margin-right: 15px; padding-block-end: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; padding-inline-end: 5px; padding-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate;

div.style: background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre; display: block; unicode-bidi: isolate;

div.span: // Função para adicionar uma nova tarefa
// Função para listar todas as tarefas
// Função para remover uma tarefa pelo ID
"Digite o ID da tarefa a ser removida: "

div.style: display: flex; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-bottom-left-radius: 5px; border-bottom-right-radius: 5px; border-end-end-radius: 5px; border-end-start-radius: 5px; justify-content: center; padding-block: 8px 12px; padding: 8px 8px 12px; padding-inline: 8px; unicode-bidi: isolate;
